synopsis.text:
Fuji Television brings us a hilarious comedy series, Kochikame, set in the bustling downtown Tokyo neighborhood of Katsushika. The story revolves around the misadventures of Ryoutsu Kankichi, an underpaid police officer with a heart of gold and a penchant for devising questionable get-rich-quick schemes.

Ryoutsu, affectionately known as Ryo-san, is a burly and short-tempered officer who works in a local police box. Despite his good intentions, his plans often backfire, landing him in hot water with his long-suffering boss, Chief Ohara. Ryoutsu's colleagues, Reiko Akimoto and Keiichi Nakagawa, also find themselves entangled in his outrageous antics.

Ryoutsu's interests are as diverse as they are numerous, including video games, model kits, and gambling. Despite his many hobbies, he has a peculiar talent for finding trouble and the uncanny ability to pull off the impossible. The series captivates viewers with its satirical humor and bizarre scenarios, such as super police cars equipped with missiles. Kochikame is a delightful blend of comedy and absurdity, making it a must-watch for fans of the genre.
